name: Batpaq
description: The batpaq is a standalone device that works the same as the phonepaq but with any mobile device. It is the first modular power bank that can charge your phone twice.
bluetoothFirmwareChanges: Fixed: 1.Device is not discoverable for Phone runs Android 8 or later with BLE5.0;  2. Enable Watchdog in project setting; Changes: 1. Reset device after BLE upgraded.
